branding.title: Branding Settings
branding.description: Connect with your customers by applying branded elements to the shipping experience

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: To preview your branded assets, visit their respective settings pages:

logo.heading: Logo
logo.descriptionLine1: Your logo will be applied to your tracking pages, notification emails, and packing slips.
logo.descriptionLine2: To apply your logo to USPS labels, visit the <0>Labels</0> settings page.
logo.descriptionZeroState: Upload a logo that will be applied to your tracking pages, notification emails and packing slips.
logo.uploadSuccess: Success! Your company logo has been uploaded.
logo.uploadError: Oops! Your logo image update failed. Please try again.
logo.invalidFileFormat: file must be PNG or JPEG format

brandColor.heading: Brand Color
brandColor.descriptionLine1: Your brand color will be applied to your tracking pages and emails.
brandColor.descriptionLine2: Choose a primary color for buttons, text titles, etc. and a lighter background color for design accents.
brandColor.updateSuccess: Success! Your brand color has been updated.
brandColor.updateError: Oops! Your brand color update failed. Please try again.

nonPro.title: Enable your own branding
nonPro.description: Upgrade to Pro Plan to have your branding on:

carriers.title: Carriers Settings
carriers.description: Use your existing contracts or discounted Shippo rates.
carriers.activateMasterAccountSuccess: Success! Your {{carrierName}} account has been activated.
carriers.addCarrierSuccess: Success! You now have access to {{carrierName}} rates.
carriers.ebayOnly: This account can only be used for fulfillment of eBay orders.
carriers.popularAccountsBannerSubtitle: Add your own carrier account and rates for even more rate options.
carriers.connectCarrierImageAltText: Link. Open a form to connect your {{carrierName}} account

canada_post.access: Gain immediate access with no additional signup required

form.actualTestAccount: Only check this box if this is a {{carrierName}} test account
form.testAccountInfo: Test mode lets you create sample labels to familiarize yourself with the process without spending money.
form.retailRatesDisclaimer: Shippo will display default retail rates for this carrier. However if you want to input your custom rates, please contact <0>support@shippo.com</0>.

serviceLevelsSection.subtitle: Hiding a service level will <0>hide it everywhere</0> in Shippo's web app. Service levels used elsewhere (as a default, automation rule, or rate at checkout) cannot be hidden.
serviceLevelsSection.disabledTooltipMsg: This service level is used elsewhere (as a default, automation rule, or rate at checkout) and can’t be hidden. You must disable other settings before you can hide it.
serviceLevelsSection.apiOnlyMsg: Please use our <0>API</0> to add/modify your account or contact <1>support@shippo.com</1>

planInfo.paygPlanDisclaimer: With your current plan, Shippo charges an additional 5¢ per label purchased through your own connected carrier accounts
planInfo.formPaygPlanDisclaimer: Note: With your current plan, Shippo charges an additional 5¢ per label purchased through your own connected carrier accounts

promo.ups: Save Up To 62% On UPS® Rates
promo.canada_post: New! Sign up to receive Canada Post® Rates

upsShortForm.title: Save Up To 62% On UPS® Rates
upsShortForm.description: You're just one click away from saving on UPS shipping. Agree to UPS' terms below to access discounted rates in Shippo.

upsMasterForm.companySubtext: Note: UPS uses your company name for recipient communications. If you have not provided a company name, UPS will use your first and last name.

carriers.createAtCarrierWebsite: To create a {{accountType}} account, visit the {{carrierName}} website.

fieldError.invalidPhone: Provided phone number is not valid.

ups_us.title: Save Up To 62% On UPS® Rates
ups_us.description: You're just one click away from saving on UPS shipping. Agree to UPS' terms below to access discounted rates in Shippo.

ups_ca.title: Get UPS® DAP Rates
ups_ca.description: You're just one click away from saving on UPS shipping. Agree to UPS' terms below to access discounted rates in Shippo.

canada_post.title: Get Canada Post Rates
canada_post.description: You're just one click away from saving on Canada Post shipping. Agree to Canada Post's terms below to access discounted rates in Shippo.

dhl_express.title: Save with DHL Express
dhl_express.description: You're just one click away from saving on DHL Express shipping. Agree to DHL’s terms below to access discounted rates in Shippo.

canadaPostRedirectForm.description: You can easily connect your existing Canada Post account with Shippo by logging into your Canada Post account:
canadaPostRedirectForm.reloadInstruction: Reload this page after the connection to confirm your account.

labels.title: Labels & Packing Slips Settings
labels.labelFormatTooltip: Choose the file type of the label. PDF is best for letter/fullpage formats, 4x6 is the best for thermal printers.
labels.packingSlipTooltip: Choose the file type of the packing slip. PDF is best for letter/fullpage formats, 4x6 is the best for thermal printers.
labels.textOnLabelTooltip: Print up to two lines on the shipping label. Only available for some carriers. Max 50 characters per line.
labels.carrierLabelTooltip: Choose the carrier of your default shipping service.
labels.serviceLevelTooltip: Setting a default shipping service will allow you to purchase a label immediately after entering package details.
labels.updateInstructions: Go to the <1>Branding</1> page to update your logo. Logo will appear greyscale on label.

errors.labelTextMaxChars: Label text cannot be longer than 50 characters per line.

printPreferences.title: Print preferences

options.SEPARATE: Print labels and packing slips separately
options.ONE_PAGE: Single page label and packing slip

printPreferences.labelPackingSlipFormat: Label & packing slip format: 8.5 x 11 in PDF

addStorePolicyOnPS.label: Add store policy on packing slip
addStorePolicyOnPS.helperText: Include return policy, final sale items, or other policies

selectServicelevel.label: 2. Select a service level for returns

labels.autoCreateReturnLabel: Auto-create return labels for outbound shipments
labels.headerSubtext: Set printing, sizing, and service level templates.

packages.title: Packages Settings
packages.deleteModalText: You will not be able to use this template for any future labels. Any previously purchased labels will not be affected.
packages.deleteModalTextAutomations: You will not be able to use this template for any future labels. Any previously purchased labels will not be affected.<0 /><0 />This package template is associated with an automation rule. Deleting it will delete the rule. This cannot be undone.
packages.headerSubtext: Save packages you use most often to speed up your label purchase process

addresses.title: Sender & return addresses
addresses.description: Save addresses you use most often to speed up your label purchase process.

recipients.title: Recipient addresses
recipients.error: Network error. Please try refreshing the page.

ratesAtCheckout.title: Rates at Checkout
ratesAtCheckout.description: Shippo-powered rate estimates in your store checkout. <0>Learn more</0>
ratesAtCheckout.addShippingOptionMessage: Add a shipping option to select carrier/service and send rates to your store checkout.
ratesAtCheckout.tableFooterMsg: Rates will be estimated using dimensions from this package:
ratesAtCheckout.CheckoutPreviewFooterMsg: Shippo rates may be estimated based on items in cart, customer address, package, and more. More delivery methods may be available in your store settings.

form.title: Add Shipping Option
form.description: Configure the shipping option to display to customers at checkout. You will have to turn these on in your Wix store settings.
form.liveRateSettingsDesc: Shippo will estimate shipping rate for your shoppers using live information from their cart like recipient address and item weights. Choose multiple services and we’ll display the cheapest one. <0>Learn more</0>

liveRateSettingsServiceLevelsNotes.liveRate: Cheapest service will be used for estimate
liveRateSettingsServiceLevelsNotes.flatRate: Cheapest service will be assigned to the order.
liveRateSettingsServiceLevelsNotes.freeShipping: Cheapest service will be assigned to the order.

form.liveRateSettingsPackToCalNote: Shippo will calculate dimensional weight from these dimensions:
form.liveRateSettingsFlatRateNote: This rate will be the fallback if rates don’t load.
form.liveRateSettingsLiveRateLabel: Fallback when estimate can’t be calculated
form.widgetWeightContent: Shipping weight is calculated from item weights set in your store.

deleteModal.title: Delete Shipping Option?
deleteModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this shipping option?

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: Based on conditions that you specify, automation rules automatically apply shipping selections to newly imported orders on your behalf (from either your connected stores or .csv import). To learn more, visit our <0>Automations Rules Support Article</0> or <1>FAQ</1>.
automations.descriptionTip: Tip: Automation rules run in sequence from top to bottom so that while multiple actions can apply to an order, the first of the same type of action (e.g. Assign Package) will apply. Drag and drop to reorder your automation rules.
automations.deleteModalText: Are you sure you want to delete this automation rule?
automations.noCustomRules: No custom rules have been set up yet. Create a new rule to get started.
automations.defaultRulesDescription: Once shipping rules are applied, defaults will apply to all remaining orders.
automations.reorderRulesInstructions: Drag rules with <1/> to rearrange the automation sequence
automations.runAutomationBtnTooltip: Heads up, automations will only run on orders imported from a store or CSV.
automations.serviceLevelRetrievalError: Please try again or contact support at support@shippo.com.

form.title: {{formAction}} automation rule
form.description: Choose from the conditions below to automatically apply actions to incoming orders. Orders must meet ALL conditions for an action to be applied.
form.productNameFieldHelpText: Try this: Copy and paste the product name from your store.

errors.onlySingleItemCondition: You may only select 1 product name per rule. Create a new rule for additional products.
errors.noConditionTypeCombinations: You may only select one order property type per automation rule.
errors.onlySingleConditions: "Is equal to" can only be used on its own. If you wish to specify a value and range, please use "is greater than or equal to" or "is less than or equal to".
errors.noOtherConditionsToBeApplied: Based on the selections that have been made, no other conditions may be applied
errors.nameRequired: You must enter a rule name.
errors.nameUnique: You must choose a unique name.
errors.conditionsRequired: You must add at least one condition.
errors.parcelTemplateRequired: You must select a package template.
errors.conditionsWeightRequired: You must enter a valid order weight.
errors.serviceLevelTokenRequired: You must select a service level.
errors.senderAPIAddressRequired: You must select a valid sender address.
errors.duplicateWeightOperators: The weight condition type cannot be the same.
errors.invalidOperatorCombination: "{{ firstOperator }}" cannot be used with "{{ secondOperator }}" as a weight condition.
errors.invalidUnitsCombination: All weight units within a rule must be the same.
errors.negativeRange: Weight must be greater than or equal to zero.
errors.conditionsProductNameRequired: You must enter a product name.
errors.conditionsItemSkuRequired: You must enter an item SKU.
errors.conditionsOrderItemQuantityRequired: You must enter a valid quantity value.
errors.conditionsOrderItemQuantityNotValidInteg: Item quantity must be an integer value greater than 0.
errors.conditionsShippingDestinationRequired: You must choose a shipment destination.
errors.conditionsShippingDestinationStateRequir: You must select at least one state.
errors.conditionsShippingDestinationZipcodeRequ: You must enter at least one zipcode.
errors.conditionsShippingDestinationCountryRequ: You must select at least one country.

form.shipToZipcodeHelpMsg: Use commas to separate zip codes. Use * for grouping multiple zip codes (i.e. 941**).

emptyRules.cta: You don't have any shipping rules set up yet. Want to create one?

enableAutomations.title: Enable Automations
enableAutomations.automateActions: Automate actions, such as applying a package template or generating a specific label, based on order conditions, such as weight, product name, and recipient location.
enableAutomations.upgradeToPro: Upgrade to the Professional plan to access automations.

plans.successNotification: Success! Your plan will automatically update on {{date}}

proPlanCallout.tryProTrial: Try Pro with a 30-day free trial to connect personal carrier accounts and use them to purchase labels without any additional per-label fees.

proPlanCallout.proPlanError: Something went wrong upgrading to Pro
proPlanCallout.reachedLabelLimit: You’ve reached the 30 label per month limit
proPlanCallout.tryProWithTrial: Try Pro with a 30-day free trial to unlock unlimited labels per month and access all of Shippo’s features.
proPlanCallout.yourPlanRenews: You've reached the 30 label per month limit. Your plan renews on {{formattedDate}}.
proPlanCallout.thirtyDays: for 30 days to unlock unlimited labels per month and access all of Shippo’s features.

downgrade.confirmation: I understand that by downgrading I will lose access to custom branding, automation rules, and multiple user access for my account. Any previously configured automation rules and branded experiences will not be able to be recovered in the future.
downgrade.disclaimer: Downgrading means losing access to Pro features.

help.reachOut: Or reach out to our global <0>support team</0>. We're here to help.

plan.freeToUse: Free to use with no monthly fees or volume restrictions when you use Shippo's carrier accounts.

promoCode.subheader: Have a promo code? Lucky you! Enter it here:

body.line1: Are you sure you want to replace your current promo code:
body.line2: Once you replace this promo code, it will no longer be active.
body.line3: If your new promo does not offer a free pro plan benefit, please downgrade via the 'plans' tab to prevent charges.

promoCode.promoApplied: Success! Your promo code has been applied to your account.

DEFAULT.firstHalf: Buy and ship your first {{minUnits}} USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{oneMonth}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer.
DEFAULT.secondHalf: Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month.
DEFAULT.expiration: Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.

terms.DEFAULT_EXTENDED_TRIAL: Enjoy {{freeMonths}} months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free {{freeMonths}}-month promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first {{freeMonths}} months after sign up.
terms.2FREEPRO: Enjoy 2 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 2 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first two month after sign up.
terms.3MONTHSFREENOW: Enjoy 3 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 3 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first three month after sign up.
terms.3MONTHSFREESUMMER: Enjoy 3 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 3 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first three month after sign up.
terms.6FREEPROFS: Enjoy 6 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 6-month promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first 6 months after sign up.
terms.BREX4MONTHSFREE: Enjoy four months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up using the Brex promo code. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 4 months promotion per customer. Promo valid for users who receive this offer directly from Shippo or Brex. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first four months after signup.
terms.FREESTYLE1000: Buy and ship your first 500 USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before 12/31/2019 and get $1,000 credit towards your future Shippo invoices applied in January 2020. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One $1,000 credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Freestyle. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 6 months. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on 10/31/2019.
terms.NOLABELFEES: Enjoy our professional plan, which includes no per-label fees and the ability to brand your customer emails and tracking pages for free. One free Shippo professional subscription for 5 years per customer. You need to switch your plan to Professional in Shippo after applying the code. Promo valid only for users that receive the offer directly from Shippo, purchase under 5 thousand labels per month, and use Shippo's master accounts with USPS and DHL. Offer must be redeemed by December 31, 2019. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid for 5 years after redemption. Shippo reserves the right to evaluate promotions on an annual basis to account for potential changes to its plans and pricing.
terms.SHIP2TEE: Buy and ship your first {{minUnits}} USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {endDate} and get a Shippo T-shirt. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One Shippo T-Shirt per customer, while supplies last. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.
terms.SHIP150: Buy and ship your first USPS or DHL Express package using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{endDate}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Freestyle. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.
terms.SHIPHERO1000: Buy and ship your first 500 USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before 12/31/2019 and get $1,000 credit towards your future Shippo invoices applied in January 2020. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One $1,000 credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or ShipHero. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 6 months. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on 10/31/2019.
terms.USPSREFERRAL: All USPS Referred customers get Shippo's Professional Plan for free with code: USPSREFERRAL. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. Promo valid only for users referred through USPS reps. Valid for lifetime after signup.
terms.NEXTSTOPSHIPPO: All FedEx Referred customers get Shippo's Professional Plan for free with code: NEXTSTOPSHIPPO. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. Promo valid only for users referred through FedEx reps. Valid for 3 month after signup.
terms.USPSREP01: Enjoy 3 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 3 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or USPS affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first three month after sign up.
terms.WEEBLYTEN: Buy and ship your first USPS or DHL Express package using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{endDate}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Weebly. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.

code.PROMO_USAGE_EXHAUSTED: Promo code is no longer available.

allTransactions.subheader: Search, filter, and export across every label purchase, surcharge, fee or refund credit.
allTransactions.actionText: Please try adjusting your search and/or filters

export.error: Oops! Something went wrong with your export. Please try again, or contact <0>support@shippo.com</0> if you continue to have issues.
export.notice: If your file does not start downloading, you may need to enable popups in your browser and try again.
export.textLine1WithFilters: You are about to export invoice items to CSV.
export.textLine1WithoutFilters: You have not set any filters—this will export the latest 10,000 transactions.
export.textLine2WithFilters: Invoice items matching these filters will be exported:
export.textLine2WithoutFilters: To set filters, click <0>Cancel</0> below and then click <0>Add Filters</0> next to the search bar.

pendingTransactions.subheader: Review pending transactions and refund requests.
pendingTransactions.emptySubtitle: Some transactions may take a few minutes to show up here – check back soon

download.vatDisclaimer: VAT to be autoreversed by the buyer

errors.retrieveInvoice: Error retrieving invoice. Please try again or contact support@shippo.com
errors.retrieveInvoiceItems: Error retrieving invoice items. Please try again or contact support@shippo.com

subheader.text: Invoices display all transactions that occurred in the given payment cycle, they can help you understand what you are being charged for.

error.paymentDeclined: Your payment has been declined. Please contact your card issuer for more information.
error.unsupportedCurrency: Your payment has been declined due to an unsupported currency. Please use an alternative payment method.
error.duplicateTransaction: Your payment has been declined due to a duplicate transaction. Please contact support for more information.
error.expiredCard: Your payment has been declined due to an expired card. Please update your card information and try again.
error.incorrectCardDetails: Your payment has been declined due to incorrect card details. Please update your card information and try again.
error.insufficientFunds: Your payment has been declined due to insufficient funds. Please use an alternative payment method.
error.temporaryError: Your payment could not be completed. Please try again later.
error.useAlternateMethod: Your payment has been declined. Please use an alternative payment method.
error.contactSupport: Your payment could not be completed. Please contact support for more information.

cells.writtenOffToolTip: This invoice does not require payment.  No action is needed.
cells.paymentPendingToolTip: ACH payment is processing and will be confirmed as paid or failed in up to 5 days. No action is needed.

notifications.steelMarketplace: You have successfully connected to Steel Marketplace. A one-time $10 credit will be applied to your next invoice.

api.title: API
api.description: Access and manage the Shippo API here to automate shipping and connect to multiple carriers with one integration.

apiDocs.title: READ THE API DOCS
apiDocs.description: Our API guides and comprehensive reference will have you shipping in no time.

sdk.title: GET STARTED WITH OUR SDK
sdk.description: Available in multiple languages to make integration easy.

token.title: Token
token.liveTokenDescription: You should never expose your Live Token. PLEASE STORE SECURELY.
token.liveTokenToolTip: Used to create live objects and production labels. It may be used for any GET or POST requests.
token.testTokenDescription: See <1>Test Mode documentation</1> for more details.
token.testTokenToolTip: This token will allow you to create any test objects and test labels for free. It may be used for any GET or POST requests.

tokenGenerateModal.title: Your API Token is
tokenGenerateModal.instruction1: You should never expose your API Token. <1>Please store securely.</1>
tokenGenerateModal.instruction2: <2>This is the only time that the API Token can be viewed.</2> You won't see it later. However, you can create a new API Token at any time.

tokenManageModal.title: Manage Your Tokens
tokenManageModal.instruction1: You should never expose your API Token. <3>Please store securely.</3>
tokenManageModal.instruction2: <4>This is the only time that the API Token can be viewed.</4> You won't see it later. However, you can create a new API Token at any time.
tokenManageModal.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to remove this token? It will <5>break</5> any existing integrations
tokenManageModal.noLiveToken: You don't have any active live tokens.
tokenManageModal.noTestToken: You don't have any active test tokens.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: For more details about webhooks, please see the <2>webhook documentation</2>.

versioning.title: Versioning
versioning.learnMore: You are on the latest API version. Learn more about <1>API Versions</1>.

upgradeModal.instruction1: Upgrading your API version may break your implementation. Be sure to test your code first. <1>Learn more about how API versioning works here</1>.
upgradeModal.instruction2: You’re upgrading to the latest API version from: <1>{{date}}</1>
upgradeModal.instruction4: <0>Learn how to test the new API version.</0>
upgradeModal.instruction5: <0>YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ROLLBACK AFTER UPGRADING.</0>
upgradeModal.instruction6: I am aware of the backwards incompatible changes of upgrading and understand that I cannot roll back after upgrading.

packingSlips.storePolicyTextPlaceholder: Include store-wide return, final sale items, inventory specific returns and any other policies.

users.title: Users
users.limitReached: You have reached {{count}} users limit. Contact sales to increase the limit.

deleteUserModal.pendingInviteDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the invitation to {{email}}?
deleteUserModal.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{firstName}} from this account?

enableAddUser.headline: Add users to your account
enableAddUser.description: Upgrade to Pro Plan to add users to your Shippo account

apps.title: Apps
apps.deleteAppText: Are you sure you want to de-authorize {{selectedApp}}?

errors.shopify_multiple_accounts: Oops! You can only connect one Shopify account at a time.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.heading: Insurance
insurance.desc: {{packageProtectionLink}} covers packages for up to $15,000. It's easier and more cost effective than carrier insurance. Package Protection is administered by Shipsurance. Certain exclusions apply. Please read the Shipsurance {{tnc}} for details.
insurance.descVariant: <0>Shippo Total Protection</0> insures your packages with low rates and an easy claims process. You’re covered for the value of lost, stolen or damaged shipments up to $10,000 including reshipping and return reimbursement.
insurance.insureAllPackage: Automatically add insurance to all my packages
insurance.insureAllPackageVariant: Automatically add protection to all my packages
insurance.insureWithAmount: Automatically add insurance to all my packages with a value above
insurance.insureWithAmountVariant: Automatically add protection to all my packages with a value above
insurance.insureManually: Do not automatically add insurance. I prefer to manually add insurance
insurance.insureManuallyVariant: Do not automatically add protection. I prefer to add manually
insurance.shipsuranceNote: Shipping insurance costs 1% of the declared order value, minimum charge $1.
insurance.xcoverNote: By adding protection, you agree to the <1>terms, conditions and exclusions</1>. Protection sold by Cover Genius and powered by XCover.
insurance.note1: Certain fragile items can't be insured. This includes items like TVs, monitors, plate/stained glass, and live plants.
insurance.note1Variant: 20% cheaper and 20 days faster claims compared to carrier insurance†
insurance.note2: Insured packages must be shipped in non-descript, unbranded packaging
insurance.note2Variant: Coverage for lost, stolen, or damaged shipments
insurance.note3: Jewelry, laptops, tablets/iPads, and items valued over $10,000 require a signature confirmation.

internationalDefaults.headerSubtext: Optimize the fulfillment process by setting default preferences for international shipments.
internationalDefaults.incotermDesc: Incoterm determines who pays for the shipment, insurance, customs clearance, and other logistical activities.
internationalDefaults.purposeOfShipmentDesc: Customs require a purpose of shipment, which can affect how your shipment is cleared and taxes are calculated.
internationalDefaults.20CharactersField: This field can't be more than 20 charecters
internationalDefaults.taxIdTypeDesc: Tax ID may be required if your shipments contain goods purchased by your recipients.

addressBook.error: Network error. Please try refreshing the page.

tags.title: Tags
tags.heading: Tags
tags.desc: Create tags to mark single or multiple orders into groups you can filter and save
tags.fetchError: Tags could not be fetched. Please refresh and try again.
